title: feat(fullstack): Setup monorepo with client and server workspaces
body:
## Summary

Implement complete monorepo structure with React (Vite) frontend and Express backend, configured for parallel development and coordinated builds.

## Changes

### Root Configuration
- Added pnpm-workspace.yaml defining client/ and server/ workspaces
- Created root package.json with parallel dev/build/test scripts
- Configured concurrently for running both servers

### Client (React + Vite)
- Initialized Vite project with React 18 and TypeScript
- Configured ESLint with React and TypeScript plugins
- Setup Jest with React Testing Library
- Added Vite proxy for /api routes → backend
- Responsive CSS with mobile-first design

### Server (Express + TypeScript)
- Created Express server with TypeScript
- Configured CORS for frontend origin (localhost:5173)
- Implemented in-memory BookStore with sample data
- Setup Jest with Supertest for API testing
- Added health check endpoint

## Type of Change

- [x] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)

## Testing

### Client Testing
- [x] App component renders correctly
- [x] Loading state displays during fetch
- [x] API integration works with mock
- [x] TypeScript compiles without errors
- [x] ESLint passes with no warnings

### Server Testing
- [x] Health check endpoint responds
- [x] CORS configured correctly
- [x] TypeScript compiles without errors
- [x] ESLint passes with no warnings

### Integration Testing
- [x] Client can connect to server via Vite proxy
- [x] Both servers start in parallel with pnpm dev
- [x] Quality checks pass for both workspaces
- [x] Build succeeds for both client and server

## Fullstack Testing

- [x] pnpm install from root installs both workspaces
- [x] pnpm dev starts both client (5173) and server (3001)
- [x] pnpm build compiles both successfully
- [x] pnpm lint passes for both workspaces
- [x] pnpm type-check validates TypeScript in both
- [x] Client → Server communication works (CORS + proxy)
- [x] Monorepo structure follows best practices

## Checklist

- [x] Code follows project style guidelines
- [x] Self-review of code completed
- [x] Changes generate no new warnings
- [x] Added tests that prove the fix is effective or feature works
- [x] New and existing unit tests pass locally
- [x] Fullstack considerations addressed (client ↔ server integration)
- [x] Both workspaces have proper .gitignore
- [x] README.md updated with setup instructions

## Related Issues

Closes #1
